DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect FFR ( Fractional flow reserve ) guide Percutaneous Coronary Intervention coronary tandem lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Effect FFR Guided Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Coronary Tandem Lesions
DOC.criteria: Tandem lesion evaluate FFR Written consent TIMI flow 〈 3 Grafted vessel Left ventricular ejection fraction 〈 30 % Severe calcification and/or severe tortuosity Uncontrolled coronary spasm Life expectancy 〈 2 year Planned high risk surgery Pregnancy breastfeeding
